table.name: Aditional comments
table.text: The language that I have been using between friends and family. Mother tongue.

table.name: Aditional comments
table.text: Moreover, quite improved during my year abroad working in Switzerland.

table.name: Aditional comments
table.text: Secondary language. All my primary and secondary education was in Basque.

table.name: Aditional comments
table.text: Obtaining during my stay at CERN, after completing the CERN integration course.
